name: Spades Classic Online
description:
CHALLENGE YOUR OPPONENTS, SMASH THEM IN SPADES CLASSIC!

Spades Classic app is now available on App Store for your Apple devices, you can download SPADES CLASSIC ONLINE for FREE and play this extraordinary mobile spades game everywhere and anytime you want.

If you enjoy playing popular board games like Spades, Euchre, Hearts, Solitaire, Kings, Spit, Gin Rummy and Canastra; Spades Classic is definitely what you are looking for!

Forget all kind of spades games you have ever known. Get ready to play the most unique Spades Card Game ever!

If you do not know how to play Spades Classic, do not worry. You can start with tutorial for beginners & challenge the AI until get ready for real online battle! Install now and feel the joy!

HOW TO PLAY?

Spades Classic is played with 4 players using standard 52 cards deck. Spades are always trump and the most important cards. Aim of game is to guess the score you will get at the end of game and try to block your opponents to achieve their bid. Earn higher score than your opponents and win the game! Become one of the best spades players and carry yourself up to the leaderboard!

THE REAL BATTLE | CHALLENGE AND WIN

* Get ready to challenge Spades experts all around the world.
* Match with better players as you win more games.
* Become the genuine master of Spades in this competitive environment.

SPLENDID VISUALITY

* Best visual experience with full HD graphics.
* Enjoy high quality animations.
* Multitouch support is enabled.

LIVE GAMEPLAY | ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

* Play against similar level real opponents.
* Unlock new achievements and prove your skills!

FASTEST SPADES CARD GAME EVER

* Easy to match, quick to play!
* Are you a newbie yet? Do not worry! You can play offline against Artificial Intelligence as well.

FREE COINS | DAILY REWARDS

* Earn free chips by watching rewarded ads.
* Login with your Facebook Account, earn more chips as a welcome gift.
* Login everyday to earn more rewards.

SOCIALIZE & MEET NEW PEOPLE

* Chat with your opponents!
* Express your feelings using emojis!
